scripts.build: rm -rf public && mkdir public && copyfiles -u 1 *.html *.js *.css *.json *.txt *.xml public && copyfiles -u 1 "libs/**/*" "img/**/*" "video/**/*" "freeAI.html" "hdr_副本.html" "hdr.html" "jntm.html" "lotbar.html" "menu.js" "normal.html" "opencut.html" "ORM.html" "prompts.js" "PS.html" "radio.html" "rembg.html" "scale.html" "SDXL.html" "sw.js" "test.html" "texture.html" "translation.html" "weaving.html" "flower.html" public && cp _worker.js ./public/_worker.js
